findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: Missing Critical Metadata Fields
findings.description: The skill manifest is missing several important metadata fields including 'license', 'compatibility', and 'allowed-tools'. While 'allowed-tools' is optional per the agent skills specification, its absence means there are no declared restrictions on what agent tools this skill can use. The missing 'license' field creates uncertainty about usage rights, and missing 'compatibility' information leaves users unclear about where this skill can be used.
findings.snippet:
YAML Manifest shows:
- license: Not specified
- compatibility: Not specified
- allowed-tools: Not specified
findings.remediation:
Add complete metadata to the YAML frontmatter:
```yaml
---
name: sora-2-nature-documentary
description: Create nature documentary videos using OpenAI Sora 2
license: MIT
compatibility: Works in Claude.ai, Claude Code, API
allowed-tools: [Read]
---
```

metadata.overall_assessment: This skill package is SAFE for use with only minor documentation and completeness issues. No security threats were identified. The skill appears to be a simple prompt template for generating nature documentary videos using OpenAI Sora 2, with no data exfiltration, command injection, prompt injection, or other malicious behavior. The main issues are: (1) missing optional metadata fields that would improve clarity, (2) an incomplete prompt template that appears truncated, and (3) a non-functional placeholder script. None of these issues pose security risks to users or the agent system. The skill does not access sensitive files, make network calls, execute arbitrary commands, or attempt to manipulate the agent's behavior.

findings.title: Incomplete Prompt Template
findings.description: The prompt template in the instruction body appears to be truncated mid-sentence, ending with 'The video quality should be 4K with 60fps, with stunning cinematogr'. This incomplete instruction could lead to confusion or unexpected behavior when the skill is used. While not a security threat, it represents misleading or inaccurate content that could affect skill functionality.
findings.snippet: Prompt ends with: '...with stunning cinematogr' (appears cut off)
findings.remediation: Complete the prompt template with the full intended text, likely: '...with stunning cinematography and professional color grading.'

metadata.overall_assessment: This skill package is SAFE for use with only minor documentation and completeness issues. No security threats were identified. The skill appears to be a simple prompt template for generating nature documentary videos using OpenAI Sora 2, with no data exfiltration, command injection, prompt injection, or other malicious behavior. The main issues are: (1) missing optional metadata fields that would improve clarity, (2) an incomplete prompt template that appears truncated, and (3) a non-functional placeholder script. None of these issues pose security risks to users or the agent system. The skill does not access sensitive files, make network calls, execute arbitrary commands, or attempt to manipulate the agent's behavior.

findings.title: Non-Functional Placeholder Script
findings.description: The included Python script (scripts/example.py) is a non-functional placeholder that only prints a message and contains TODO comments. While not malicious, this represents a form of tool misrepresentation where the skill package includes a script file that serves no actual purpose. The script does not implement any functionality related to Sora 2 video generation or nature documentary creation.
findings.snippet:
Script contains only:
```python
def main():
    print("This is an example script for sora-2-nature-documentary")
    # TODO: Add actual script logic here
```
findings.remediation:
Either remove the placeholder script entirely if no helper scripts are needed, or implement actual functionality such as:
- API integration with OpenAI Sora 2
- Video parameter validation
- Prompt template processing
- Output file handling

metadata.overall_assessment: This skill package is SAFE for use with only minor documentation and completeness issues. No security threats were identified. The skill appears to be a simple prompt template for generating nature documentary videos using OpenAI Sora 2, with no data exfiltration, command injection, prompt injection, or other malicious behavior. The main issues are: (1) missing optional metadata fields that would improve clarity, (2) an incomplete prompt template that appears truncated, and (3) a non-functional placeholder script. None of these issues pose security risks to users or the agent system. The skill does not access sensitive files, make network calls, execute arbitrary commands, or attempt to manipulate the agent's behavior.
